name: Camping Mastery
description: Reduces campfire setup time by 50% and increases the duration of the campfire by 30%

name: Chase
description: Detect recent enemy footsteps. (Recent enemy player footsteps display as red footprints on the ground within 4.5 meters.) and can hear enemy footstep sounds from twice as far away.

name: Crippling Shot
description: Hitting the target's leg reduces their Move Speed Bonus by -40% for 1 seconds.

name: Crossbow Mastery
description: While using a crossbow, gain 5% Physical Power Bonus and an additional 50% Action Speed while reloading.

name: Kinesthesia
description: When moving with the bowstring drawn, move speed bonus increases by 10%.

name: Nimble Hands
description: When using a bow, increases your draw speed by 15%.

name: Quick Reload
description: When reloading a bow-type weapon, gain 50% Action Speed.

name: Ranged Weapons Mastery
description: When attacking with a Ranged (bow/crossbow) weapon, gain 5% Physical Power Bonus.

name: Sharpshooter
description: When attacking with a Ranged (bow/crossbow) weapon, gain 15% Headshot Damage.

name: Spear Proficiency
description: Gain the ability to equip spears. While using a spear, gain 7 Physical Power.

name: Trap Mastery
description: Dramatically decreases installation time for traps. (+100% Regular Interaction Speed during installation)

name: Ambush
description: The first attack within 3 seconds after exiting the Hide skill benefits from +50% increased Physical Power Bonus. Move Speed Bonus is increased by +10% for 3 seconds until the next action is performed when coming out of the Hide skill, excluding other sources of invisibility. If attack is successful the effect disappears.

name: Back Attack
description: Increases Physical Power Bonus by +30% when attacking from behind a target.

name: Creep
description: When creeping (which activates after crouching for 0.5s with non-plated boots), movement speed is increased by an additional 30%.

name: Dagger Mastery
description: Increases Physical Power Bonus by +15% when attacking with a dagger.

name: Double Jump
description: Unlocks the ability to jump once while mid-air at the cost of -18 Move Speed.

name: Hide Mastery
description: Extends the total duration of the Hide skill to 40 seconds. (As Hide is a buff, its duration is affected by Starter Rogue's -30% buff duration)

name: Jokester
description: Grant all party members within 4.5 meters +2 All Attributes.

name: Pickpocket
description: You can steal an enemy's item from the dungeon by using the 'interact' key. Bumps no longer break stealth. Items currently equipped by enemies cannot be stolen. Stolen item is random. Items worn in utility slots do not appear on the waist.

name: Poisoned Weapon
description: A successful attack applies poison that deals 4 Magical Damage over 4 seconds as Damage over Time. The poison can stack up to 5 times at once. (only works with daggers, crossbows, and swords)

name: Stealth
description: When using the Hide skill, you can move 10 steps while crouching or slow walking without breaking invisibility.

name: Thrust
description: Grants +20% increased Armor Penetration when swinging with Daggers.

name: Traps and Locks
description: Highlights traps within 4.5 meters. Highlighted traps can be disarmed by the player. And gives the ability to pick locks without a lockpick.

name: Adrenaline Spike
description: When the Fighter's health reaches below 40%, they become flooded with adrenaline and gain additional +15% Action Speed for 12 seconds. Cooldown appears as a debuff: 60s.

name: Barricade
description: Gain +50 additional Armor Rating and Magical Resistance during a block.

name: Combo Attack
description: After landing two consecutive attacks within 2 seconds, gain +10% increased Physical Power Bonus for 2 seconds. (Needs 2 hits to initially proc and applies on the 3rd hit and beyond.)

name: Counterattack
description: Successfully blocking an attack grants +10% increased Move Speed Bonus and an additional +10% Action Speed for 3 seconds.

name: Defense Mastery
description: Increases Armor Rating acquired from armor by 10%.

name: Dual Wield
description: Equipping weapons in both hands grants additional flat +10% Action Speed. (works with all secondary weapons, excluding lanterns and shields)

name: Projectile Resistance
description: Increases Projectile Damage Reduction by +10%.

name: Shield Expert
description: Increases Move Speed Bonus by +10% during a block, if an attack is blocked successfully, gain 50% Action Speed for the next blocking or attacking action. (the timing window is very tight, you need to attack as quickly as possible after a blocked hit to make use of it)

name: Slayer
description: Cannot equip plate armor, but gain +5 'Buff' Weapon Damage when holding a weapon in each hand. (works with all secondary weapons, excluding lanterns and shields)

name: Swift
description: Reduces the base movement speed penalty from equipped armor by -20%. Not applicable to additional speed modifiers.

name: Weapon Mastery
description: All primary and secondary weapons are available regardless of class requirements. When using non-native weapons, Physical Power Bonus is decreased by -10%.

name: Sword Mastery
description: When using a Sword-type weapon, gain 2 Weapon Damage and 5% Action Speed. Also gain 10 Move Speed when taking a defensive stance with your sword.

name: Axe Specialization
description: Adds +5 Weapon damage to your Axe attacks.

name: Berserker
description: The lower your remaining HP, the higher your physical power bonus, up to 33.33% at just above 0hp. The benefit is negatively affected by Health Bonus %, like Robust, War Cry, and Blood Exchange, which all add together. Physical Power Bonus = (1 - CurrentHealth/MaxHealth * (1 + HealthBonus%))/3. The bonus cannot be negative.

name: Carnage
description: Armor Rating increases by 75 for 7 seconds when a target is killed.

name: Executioner
description: Increases headshot Damage with Axes by an additive +10%.

name: Iron Will
description: Increases Magic Resist by 100 and ignores knockback effects.

name: Morale Boost
description: Recovers 12% of Max Health after killing a player.

name: Potion Chugger
description: Alters all Potions to have 50% of their base duration and provide +20% of the effect. Note that base duration implies that the amount of effect received from the total duration is unchanged.

name: Savage
description: Physical Power Bonus increases by +10% when not wearing any chest armor.

name: Crush
description: Ability to destroy unreinforced doors and sturdy containers. Also increases the Impact Power of your two-handed attacks by 1 to better defeat blocks and parries.

name: Robust
description: Increases Max Health Bonus by +15%.

name: Two-Hander
description: Increases Physical Power Bonus by +5% when attacking with a two-handed weapon.

name: Treacherous Lungs
description: Increases base duration of all Shout skills (War Cry, Rage, Savage Roar) by +25%.

name: Arcane Feedback
description: Each time you do damage with an arcane spell your Spell Casting Speed and Magic Power Bonus increase by 2% per stack. Arcane Feedback can stack up to 5 times at once. The bonus duration lasts for 7 seconds and resets with each successful stack.

name: Arcane Mastery
description: Increases Magic Power Bonus by +5% when using Arcane spells, and reduces the base casting time of Arcane spells by 0.5 seconds.

name: Fire Mastery
description: Increases Magic Power Bonus by +5% when using Fire spells, and increases the duration of the burn effect for Fireball, Ignite, and Zap by 2 seconds. The total damage of the burn remains the same. Additionally, the burn now applies 50% Heal Reduction

name: Ice Shield
description: Grants +20 flat Armor Rating, and inflicts Frostbite on melee attackers for 0.5 seconds. Cooldown of 5 seconds in the form of a debuff. Frostbite inflicts -20% decreased Move Speed Bonus and -20% Action Speed.

name: Mana Surge
description: Increases Magic Power Bonus by +10%.

name: Melt
description: If you deal magical fire damage to a target, the target's Physical Damage Reduction is reduced by a flat -10% for 5 seconds.

name: Quick Chant
description: Increases Spell Casting Speed by +10%.

name: Reactive Shield
description: Activates an arcane reactive shield that lasts for 3 seconds when you take damage. The arcane shield can absorb 15 total damage, and can absorb both Physical and Magical Damage. The shield can only reactivate after a cooldown of 12s. The shield has 0% Scaling.

name: Sage
description: Increases Knowledge by +10%.

name: Spell Overload
description: Reduces Memory Capacity Bonus % by 60% additively and increases all spell counts by 60%

name: Staff Mastery
description: When using a staff-type weapon, you gain 3 Magic Weapon Damage. (Magic Staff, Quarterstaff)

name: Ice Mastery
description: Dealing damage with ice magic freezes the target in place for 0.5 seconds.

name: Advanced Healer
description: Increases your Magical Healing stat by 5.

name: Blunt Weapon Mastery
description: Increases Physical Power Bonus by +10% when attacking with a mace-type weapon.

name: Brewmaster
description: You do not exhibit the detrimental drunk effects when you drink Ale and + 10 Strength.

name: Faithfulness
description: Gain 15% divine magical damage bonus.

name: Holy Aura
description: Increase the flat Armor Rating and Magic Resist Rating of yourself and all party members within 4.5 meters by +15.

name: Holy Water
description: Drinking will eliminate all removable curse effects.

name: Kindness
description: Heal yourself for 15% of the spell's total heal amount when healing an ally.

name: Over Healing
description: Can Heal additional health up to 25% of Max Health, decays at 1% of Max Health per second.

name: Perseverance
description: Reduces all types of final incoming damage by 3 per tick, including each tick of Damage over Time and True damage, to a minimum of 1 damage.

name: Protection from Evil
description: Grants -50% Debuff Duration. (This effectively makes debuffs last less time.)

name: Requiem
description: Resurrecting an ally revives them with 50% HP instead of a sliver of life. When reviving an ally at the Altar of Sacrifice, you do not need to sacrifice any of your own health.

name: Undead Slaying
description: Deal 20% increased physical damage against undead monsters. It is unknown if this is Physical Power Bonus or a final multiplier.

name: Charismatic Performance
description: Upgrades a 'good' performance into a 'perfect' performance.

name: Dancing Feet
description: Increases your flat Move Speed by +10 when holding an instrument.

name: Fermata
description: Gain 5 Resourcefulness

name: Jolly Time
description: Drinking Ale heals 5 HP and grants +10 flat Move Speed when drunk.

name: Lore Mastery
description: A high level of understanding of objects increases Regular Interaction Speed and Magical Interaction Speed by an additional flat +25%.

name: Melodic Protection
description: While playing, the caster's Physical Damage Reduction is increased by an additional flat +30%.

name: Rapier Mastery
description: When a rapier is equipped in either hand, 'Buff' Weapon Damage increases by +2 and Action Speed increases by an additional flat +5%.

name: Reinforced Instruments
description: 50% increased Physical Power Bonus when attacking with a musical instrument as a weapon. (This does not apply to Song playing)

name: Story Teller
description: Give all party members within 4.5 meters +3 Will and Knowledge.

name: Superior Dexterity
description: 50% faster switching time when switching between weapons/utility items.

name: Wanderer's Luck
description: Increases the chances of finding high-quality items when opening treasure chests. Increases Luck by a flat +50.

name: War Song
description: If the performance is successful, increases 'Buff' Weapon Damage of yourself and allies within 4.5 meters by +3 for 6 seconds.

name: Antimagic
description: Your magic damage reduction is increased additively by 25% against all elemental magic damage except divine magic and curse magic. Antimagic does not reduce damage of the following: Crystal Sword, Staff Mastery, Poison Weapons (these examples are dealing non-elemental/neutral magic damage).

name: Curse Mastery
description: Your curses (Curse of Pain, Curse of Weakness, and Power of Sacrifice) use a new status effect which are altered to have 30% longer base durations. 10.4s for Curse of Pain, 13s for Curse of Weakness, 15.6s for Power of Sacrifice. This allows a Curse without Curse Mastery to be active on a target at the same time as a Curse that uses Curse Mastery. Curse of Pain's total damage remains constant, lowering the damage per tick, but increasing the number of ticks. Power of Sacrifice's damage per tick, however, always remains the same, increasing the number of ticks and the total damage.

name: Dark Enhancement
description: Grants +10% Magic Power Bonus for Dark Magic.

name: Dark Reflection
description: When you receive melee damage, reflect 10 dark magic Damage to the attacker. 15 seconds cooldown in the form of a debuff (now consumes Darkness Shards when activated.). 100% scaling.

name: Demon Armor
description: Gain ability to wear plate armor at the cost of -10% Spell Casting Speed.

name: Infernal Pledge
description: 25% Damage Reduction from Undead and Demons

name: Immortal Lament
description: Casting spells will not take you below 1 health.

name: Malice
description: Will is increased by 10%.

name: Shadow Touch
description: 2 true magic damage and 2 magical heal on melee hit. Affected by Vampirism. 0% Scaling

name: Soul Collector
description: When dealing the final blow to an enemy, one darkness shard is collected. Each collected shard increases Magic Power Bonus for Dark Magic by 10%, up to a maximum of 10 stacks, lasting until and including the next Dark Magic spell/perk is casted. When a spell/perk consumes the effect, the entire spell/perk's damage is affected by the bonus.

name: Torture Mastery
description: When Curse of Pain or Power of Sacrifice are active on a target, any instance of Magical Damage Over Time from Curse of Pain or Power of Sacrifice dealt to the target will heal the Warlock for 2 Magical Healing. This healing is increased by the Magical Healing stat and the Warlock's Magic Power Bonus. This healing has 10% Attribute Bonus Ratio. Also doubles the health cost of spells.

name: Vampirism
description: Grants a 1.2x multiplier to all incoming Magical Healing. This multiplier is separate from Magic Power Bonus. Although Life Drain heals only based off of damage dealt, Vampirism does affect it. Unaffected by scaling.
